summary: Complete frontend testing of Frontal Équestre Configurator with 5 NEW colors added (Bleu Marine, Rose, Argent, Turquoise, Bordeaux). All 22 tests passed (100%). Stone size reduced from 75px to 42px - NO overlap detected. All 9 colors functional, duplicate selection works, pattern logic correct.
passed_tests: App loads correctly at https://browband-customizer.preview.emergentagent.com
Main title 'Créez Votre Frontal' displayed correctly
Styles grid visible with 3-column layout
All 9 stone styles displayed: Marron, Saphir, Noir Diamant, Fushia, Bleu Marine, Rose, Argent, Turquoise, Bordeaux
All 9 style labels correct (verified text content)
Single style selection (1/4) works correctly
Duplicate selection allowed (same color can be selected multiple times)
Pattern Saphir-Saphir-Rose created successfully with 3/4 styles
4 styles maximum enforced (buttons disabled after 4 selections)
Style buttons disabled after max 4 selections
Export button disabled when no style selected
Export button enabled when style selected
'Tout effacer' button clears all selections (0/4 styles)
Export button disabled after clearing selections
Zoom modal opens when clicking on preview
Zoom modal closes when clicking
Visual inspection shows strass are well-spaced with no overlap (42px size)
Export button shows 'Exporter en PNG'
Export functionality triggered (download initiated for frontal-personnalise.png)
Stone count shows '33 pierres'
Individual style removal works (× button)
Pattern updates correctly after individual removal
critical_code_review_comments: STONE_STYLES array correctly contains all 9 colors with proper image sources
STONE_SIZE reduced to 42px - matches minimum distance between positions (~42px)
Canvas-based rendering with hidden high-res canvas (2816x557) and scaled display canvas
All interactive elements have data-testid attributes for testing
Responsive design with 3-column grid for styles
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 9 stone styles working: Marron, Saphir, Noir Diamant, Fushia (original 4) + Bleu Marine, Rose, Argent, Turquoise, Bordeaux (5 new). Stone size is 42px to avoid overlap. 33 fixed positions. Pattern allows 1-4 styles including duplicates. Export generates PNG via canvas.toDataURL(). Zoom modal on preview click. All data-testid attributes in place.
